alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 26 at 7:41PM PST until February 28 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM MONDAY TO 4 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches, except 4 to 12 inches above 3500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascades and Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...From 7 AM Monday to 4 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Locally higher amounts greater than a foot possible along the peaks and volcanos. Heaviest snowfall expected Monday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
